4. User Login Activity

The User Login Activity section tracks login details for users. It records key information such as:

  • Login date and time
  • Which user logged in
  • Sometimes the location or device used, depending on configuration

This log helps administrators monitor access, detect unusual activity and support audits or security reviews.
